Verses: 1 appozhudhu Annaal Jepam Panni: En Irudhayam Karththarukkul Kalikoorukiradhu; En Kompu Karththarukkul Uyarndhirukkiradhu; En Pakaignarinmel En Vaai Thirandhirukkiradhu; Ummutaiya Iratchippinaale Sandhoshappatukiren.
2 karththaraippolap Parisuththamullavar Illai; Ummaiyallaamal Veroruvarum Illai; Engal Thevanaippola Oru Kanmalaiyum Illai.
3 ini Mettimaiyaana Pechchaip Pesaadhirungal; Akandhaiyaana Pechchu Ungal Vaayilirundhu Purappataventaam; Karththar Gnaanamulla Thevan; Avar Seykaikal Yadhaarththamallavo?
4 palavaankalin Vil Murindhadhu; Thallaatinavarkalo Palaththinaal Itaikattappattaarkal.

5 thirupdhiyaayirundhavarkal Appaththukkaaka Koolivelai Seykiraarkal; Pasiyaayirundhavarkalo Inip Pasiyaayiraarkal; Malatiyaayirundhaval Ezhu Petraal; Anekam Pillaikalaip Petravalo Palatchayappattaal.
6 karththar Kollukiravarum Uyirppikkiravarumaayirukkiraar; Avare Paadhaalaththil Irangavum Adhilirundhu Eravum Pannukiravar.
7 karththar Thariththiram Ataiyachcheykiravarum, Aisuvariyam Ataiyappannukiravarumaayirukkiraar; Avar Thaazhththukiravarum, Uyarththukiravarumaanavar.

8 avar Siriyavanaip Puzhudhiyilirundhu Etuththu, Eliyavanaik Kuppaiyilirundhu Uyarththukiraar; Avarkalaip Pirapukkalote Utkaaravum, Makimaiyulla Singaasanaththaich Chudhandharikkavum Pannukiraar; Poomiyin Asdhipaarangal Karththarutaiyavaikal; Avare Avaikalinmel Poochchakkaraththai Vaiththaar.
9 avar Thamadhu Parisuththavaankalin Paadhangalaik Kaappaar; Thunmaarkkar Irulile Mownamaavaarkal; Pelaththinaal Oruvanum Merkolvadhillai.

10 karththarote Vazhakkaatukiravarkal Norukkappatuvaarkal; Vaanaththilirundhu Avarkalmel Muzhanguvaar; Karththar Poomiyin Kataiyaandharangalai Niyaayandheerththu, Thaam Erpatuththina Raajaavukkup Pelan Aliththu, Thaam Apishekam Panninavarin Kompai Uyarappannuvaar Endru Thudhiththaal.
11 pinpu Elkkaanaa Raamaavilirukkira Than Veettukkup Ponaan; Andhap Pillaiyo, Aasaariyanaakiya Elikku Munpaakak Karththarukkup Panivitai Seydhukontirundhaan.
12 eliyin Kumaarar Peliyaalin Makkalaayirundhaarkal; Avarkal Karththarai Ariyavillai.

13 andha Aasaariyarkal Janangalai Natappiththa Vidham Ennavendraal, Evanaakilum Oru Paliyaich Cheluththungaalaththil Iraichchi Vekumpodhu, Aasaariyanutaiya Velaikkaaran Moondru Koorulla Oru Aayudhaththaith Than Kaiyile Pitiththuvandhu,

14 adhinaale, Kopparaiyilaavadhu Paanaiyilaavadhu Saruvaththilaavadhu Sattiyilaavadhu Kuththuvaan; Andha Aayudhaththil Varukiradhaiyellaam Aasaariyan Etuththukkolluvaan; Appati Ange Seelovile Varukira Isravelarukkellaam Seydhaarkal.

15 kozhuppaith Thakanikkiradharku Munnum, Aasaariyanutaiya Velaikkaaran Vandhu Paliyitukira Manushanai Nokki: Aasaariyanukkup Porikkumpati Iraichchikotu; Pachchai Iraichchiye Allaamal, Aviththadhai Unkaiyile Vaangukiradhillai Enpaan.

16 adharku Andha Manushan: Indru Seyyaventiyapati Mudhalaavadhu Kozhuppaith Thakaniththuvitattum; Pirpaatu Un Manaviruppaththinpati Etuththukkol Endru Sonnaalum; Avan: Appatiyalla, Ippozhudhe Kotu, Illaavittaal Palavandhamaai Etuththukkolluven Enpaan.
17 aadhalaal Andha Vaaliparin Paavam Karththarutaiya Sannidhiyil Mikavum Peridhaayirundhadhu; Manushar Karththarin Kaanikkaiyai Veruppaai Enninaarkal.
18 saamuvel Ennum Pillaiyaantaan Sanal Nool Epoththaith Thariththavanaaik Karththarukku Munpaakap Panivitai Seydhaan.
19 avanutaiya Thaai Varushandhorum Seluththum Paliyaich Cheluththukiradharkaaka, Than Purushanotekoota Varukirapodhellaam, Avanukku Oru Sinnach Chattaiyaith Thaiththuk Kontu Varuvaal.

20 eli Elkkaanaavaiyum Avan Manaiviyaiyum Aaseervadhiththu: Indha Sdhiree Karththarukkendru Oppukkotuththadharkup Padhilaakak Karththar Unakku Avalaale Sandhaanam Kattalaiyituvaaraaka Endraan; Avarkal Thangal Sdhaanaththirkuth Thirumpap Poivittaarkal.

21 appatiye Karththar Annaalaik Kataatchiththaar; Aval Karppandhariththu Moondru Kumaararaiyum Irantu Kumaaraththikalaiyum Petraal; Saamuvel Ennum Pillaiyaantaan Karththarutaiya Sannidhiyil Valarndhaan.

22 eli Mikundha Kizhavanaayirundhaan; Avan Than Kumaarar Isravelukkellaam Seykira Ellaavatraiyum, Avarkal Aasarippuk Kootaaraththin Vaasalil Koottangootukira Sdhireekalote Sayanikkiradhaiyum Kelvippattu,
23 avarkalai Nokki: Neengal Ippatippatta Kaariyangalaich Cheykiradhu Enna? Indha Janangal Ellaarum Ungal Pollaadha Natakkaikalaich Chollakketkiren.
24 en Kumaarare, Ventaam; Naan Kelvippatukira Indhach Cheydhi Nalladhalla; Karththarutaiya Janangal Meeri Natakkiradharkuk Kaaranamaayirukkireerkale.

25 manushanukku Virodhamaaka Manushan Paavanjeydhaal, Niyaayaadhipadhikal Adhaith Theerppaarkal; Oruvan Karththarukku Virodhamaakap Paavanjeyvaaneyaakil, Avanukkaaka Vinnappanjeyyaththakkavan Yaar Endraan; Avarkalo Thangal Thakappan Sollaik Kelaamarponaarkal; Avarkalaich Changarikkak Karththarsiththamaayirundhaar.
26 saamuvel Ennum Pillaiyaantaano, Periyavanaaka Valarndhu, Karththarukkum Manusharukkum Piriyamaaka Natandhukontaan.
27 thevanutaiya Manushan Oruvan Eliyinitaththil Vandhu: Karththar Uraikkiradhu Ennavendraal, Un Pidhaavin Veettaar Ekipdhile Paarvonin Veettil Irukkaiyil, Naan Ennai Avarkalukku Velippatuththi,

28 en Palipeetaththinmel Paliyitavum, Thoopangaattavum, En Samukaththil Epoththaith Tharikkavum, Isravel Koththirangalilellaam Avanai Enakku Aasaariyanaakath Therindhukontu, Un Pidhaavin Veettaarukku Isravel Puththirarutaiya Thakanapalikalaiyellaam Kotukkavillaiyaa?

29 en Vaasasdhalaththile Seluththumpati Naan Kattalaiyitta En Paliyaiyum, En Kaanikkaiyaiyum, Neengal Udhaippaanen? En Janamaakiya Isravelin Kaanikkaikalilellaam Piradhaanamaanavaikalaik Kontu Ungalaik Kozhukkappannumpatikku, Nee Ennaippaarkkilum Un Kumaararai Madhippaanen Enkiraar.

30 aakaiyaal Isravelin Thevanaakiya Karththar Sollukiradhaavadhu: Un Veettaarum Un Pidhaavin Veettaarum Endraikkum En Sannidhiyil Natandhu Kolvaarkal Endru Naan Nichchayamaaich Cholliyirundhum, Ini Adhu Enakkuth Thooramaayiruppadhaaka; Ennaik Kanampannukiravarkalai Naan Kanam Pannuven; Ennai Asattai Pannukiravarkal Kanaveenappatuvaarkal Endru Karththar Sollukiraar.
31 un Veettil Oru Kizhavanum Iraadhapatikku Un Puyaththaiyum Un Pidhaavin Veettaarutaiya Puyaththaiyum Naan Thariththuppotum Naatkal Varum.
32 isravelukkuch Cheyyappatum Sakala Nanmaikalukkum Maaraaka En Vaasasdhalaththile Upaththiravaththaik Kaanpaai; Orupodhum Un Veettil Oru Kizhavanum Iruppadhillai.

33 en Palipeetaththil Sevikka, Naan Un Sandhadhiyil Nirmoolamaakkaadhavarkalo, Un Kankalaip Pooththuppokap Pannavum, Un Aaththumaavai Vedhanaippatuththavum Vaikkappatuvaarkal; Un Vamsaththilulla Yaavarum Vaalavayadhile Saavaarkal.
34 opni Pinekaas Ennum Un Irantu Kumaararinmel Varuvadhe Unakku Ataiyaalamaayirukkum; Avarkal Iruvarum Orenaalil Saavaarkal.

35 naan En Ullaththukkum En Siththaththukkum Etrapati Seyyaththakka Unmaiyaana Oru Aasaariyanai Ezhumpappanni, Avanukku Nilaiyaana Veettaik Kattuven; Avan Ennaal Apishekam Pannappattavanukku Munpaakach Chakala Naalum Natandhukolluvaan.

36 appozhudhu Un Veettaaril Meedhiyaayiruppavan Evanum Oru Vellippanaththukkaakavum Oru Appaththunikkaikkaakavum Avanitaththil Vandhu Panindhu: Naan Konjam Appam Saappita Yaadhoru Aasaariya Oozhiyaththil Ennaich Cherththukkollum Endru Kenjuvaan Endru Sollukiraar Endraan.
